attributes.action: Full cost recovery from vexatious and repeat abuse of the petitions system
attributes.background: Noble in original intent the petitions system has increasingly been used as a campaigning tool by vexatious & repeat petitioners particularly in the animal rights sector. These petitioners abuse the system by starting multiple petitions, use “sock puppets” to petition or as publicity to sell books.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
